description:
Mikan and Hotaru are best friends! Or at least, Mikan thinks so. The two have gone to the same small school all their lives, but their school is about to be shut down!  Mikan desperately tries to prevent that from happening, but Hotaru has other plans...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The School Is Going to Be Shut Down
学校がなくなっちゃう
